title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description:
Easily fly your drone with Fly Drone Remote Controller app - Drone mobile app for remote control drone from your phone, compatible with a wide range of drones model, flycam, UAV... 

Drone Controller app offers intuitive features like drone mapping with airmap, drone panorama shooting with drone camera view from phone, drone navigation model. Elevate your drone flight experience with our remote controll drone app. Easy to control a drone flight and take great drone footage for your journey

*DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES:

- Drone Panorama Photography: Capture panoramic images and videos with your drone camera view on your phone. Take great drone footage to enhance your journey.

- UAV Forecast: Forecast weather for drone, stay updated on current weather conditions with real-time temperature, wind speed, and precipitation levels, ensuring safe and optimal flying conditions for your drone, flycam, or UAV.

- Drone No-Fly Zone Map: Receive instant alerts and guidance to avoid restricted areas with the drone fly zone map. Stay informed about no-fly zones near airports, military bases, and other sensitive locations, ensuring compliance and safety.

- Smart Flight Modes: Easy to remote control drone with intelligent flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience.

- Drone Footage Export: Transfer your drone data media to your device for quick sharing and editing. Support for high-quality file formats: JPG, GeoTIFF, DXF/SHP, PDF, MOV, 4K, MP4,...

- Find My Drone: Utilize Drone GPS tracker to locate your drone in case of loss or emergency situations, get safe for your flight of drone.

- Home Point: Set and save a designated location as the home point for your drone. In the event of signal loss or low battery, your drone will automatically return to this point for a safe landing.

- Intuitive User Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation.

- On-Screen Exposure Graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone's camera settings.

- Drone Gimbal Direction Adjustment: Fine-tune the direction of your drone's gimbal for optimal camera positioning and stability.

-  Tutorials - How to fly drones for beginners: Access tutorials for beginners to get how to fly drone, flycam, or UAV piloting with ease. Experience the next level of drone flight controller and exploration with the ""Fly Drone Remote Controller"" app.

Compatible with drone models/flycam/uav

Note: Fly Drone Remote Controller is not an official drone app; it supports drone models for Android phones. If you have any issues, please contact: support@goflydrone.app

SUBSCRIPTION FLY DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER PLANS:

Monthly subscription: $9.99/month
6-month subscription: $24.99/6-month
Lifetime: $39.99

Terms of Service: http://apponfire.co/terms.html
Privacy: http://apponfire.co/privacy-policy.html
